method: Mix the soy yogurt, milk and nutritional yeast and add the kala namak salt.
Finely chop the onions and roast them gently in a pan.
If you want to add vegetables, cut or strip them and add it to the pan.
Crumble the tofu with your hands or a fork and add it to the rest. Stir and cook it over medium heat for 5 minutes.
Add the yorgurt mix, stir the scramble and let it cook again for some minutes.
Season the scramble with salt and pepper. If you like, top it with some chives. Bon appetite.
